const stylelint = require('stylelint');
const colorsJSON = require('@lancers/design_guideline/scripts/colors.json');
const spacingJSON = require('@lancers/design_guideline/scripts/spacing.json');

const ruleName = '@lancers/design-guideline';
const messages = stylelint.utils.ruleMessages(ruleName, {
  expected: 'Expected...',
});

/**
 * ç¾çŠ¶ã¯padding, padding-[top,...],margin,margin-[top,...],grid-gap,gapãªã©ã®é–“éš”ã‚’å¯¾è±¡ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
 */
const spacingPropReg = /(\S*padding\S*|\S*margin\S*|\S*gap\S*)/;
/**
 * #ã®ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä»¥å¤–ã«$ãªã©ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚‚å¯¾è±¡ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
 * colors.jsonã«ã¯å¤‰æ•°å-ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®æƒ…å ±ã‚‚ä¿å­˜ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§
 * é©å½“ãªSasså¤‰æ•°ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è‰²é©å¿œã‚’è¨±å¯ã—ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸ
 */
const colorReg = /(#|\$)[0-9a-zA-Z]*/;
/**
 * pxä»¥å¤–ã«$ãªã©ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚‚å¯¾è±¡ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
 * spacing.jsonã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«å¤‰æ•°å-pxã®æƒ…å ±ã‚‚ä¿å­˜ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§
 * é©å½“ãªSasså¤‰æ•°ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹pxé©å¿œã‚’è¨±å¯ã—ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸ
 */
const spacingReg = /([0-9]*px|\$[0-9a-zA-Z]*)/;

const checkColors = ({ decl, result }) => {
  // CSSã§ã„ã†paddingãªã©ã®styleå±æ€§ã‚’propã§æ‰±ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹
  const prop = decl.prop;

  const matched = decl.value.match(colorReg);

  const color = colorsJSON[matched[0]] || colorsJSON[matched[0].toLowerCase()];
  if (!color) {

    stylelint.utils.report({

  const definedColor = color.sass;

    stylelint.utils.report({

  }

const checkSpacing = ({ decl, result }) => {
  // CSSã§ã„ã†paddingãªã©ã®styleå±æ€§ã‚’propã§æ‰±ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹
  const prop = decl.prop;
  if (!spacingPropReg.test(prop)) {

    return;

  const matched = decl.value.match(spacingReg);

  // pxãƒ»å¤‰æ•°åã®ãƒãƒƒãƒãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹
  const spacing = spacingJSON[matched[0].toLowerCase()];

    stylelint.utils.report({
      ruleName,

      node: decl,

  // spacing.sassã¯JSONã«ã‚ã‚‹Sassç”¨ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚’ç¤ºã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
  const definedSpacing = spacing.sass;

       * è¤‡æ•°ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦Stylelintã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆåˆ†ã‘ã‚‹ã®ã«ã‚‚ãŸã‚ã‚‰ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹
       */
      checkColors({ decl, result });

module.exports.messages = messages;

import { Rule } from 'eslint';

import { colorReg, cssInJSReg } from './util';

const colorsJSON = require('@lancers/design_guideline/scripts/colors.json');

const emotionColors = {

      VariableDeclaration(node) {

        const code = context.getSourceCode().getText(node);

        const matcheString = matched[0].toString();

          colorsJSON[matcheString] || colorsJSON[matcheString.toLowerCase()];
        if (!color) {
          // ãƒãƒƒãƒãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯æœªå®šç¾©ã®ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¦æ³¨æ„ã™ã‚‹
          context.report({
            node,

        }
        const definedColor = color.script;

        if (definedColor) {
          // ãƒãƒƒãƒã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯å€™è£œã‚’ææ¡ˆã™ã‚‹
          context.report({
            node,

            /**

             */
            fix(fixer) {

              const fixedCode = sourceCode.replace(matcheString, definedColor);

              // å®Ÿéš›ã®ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸Šã«ã‚‚æ–‡å­—åˆ—ç½®æ›ã‚’åæ˜ ã™ã‚‹
              return fixer.replaceText(scope, fixedCode);

import { Rule } from 'eslint';

import { spacingPropReg, spacingReg } from './util';

const spacingJSON = require('@lancers/design_guideline/scripts/spacing.json');

const emotionSpacing = {
  meta: {
    type: 'suggestion',
    docs: {
      description: '@lancers/design_guidelineå…±é€šã®é–“éš”ã®pxæŒ‡å®šãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«',
    },
    fixable: 'code',
  },
  create(context) {
    return {
      /**
       * const, varãªã©ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ãŸç®‡æ‰€ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹
       * nodeã®å¯¾è±¡ã¯å¤‰æ•°å®šç¾©ã®ç®‡æ‰€
       */
      VariableDeclaration(node) {
        /**
         * context.getSourceCode ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®å…¨ä½“ã®ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æ‰±ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹
         */
        const code = context.getSourceCode().getText(node);

        if (!code) return;

        const propMatch = code.toString().match(spacingPropReg);
        if (!propMatch) {
          return;
        }

        const propString = propMatch[0].toString();

        const pxMatch = propString.match(spacingReg);

        if (!pxMatch) {
          return;
        }

        const pxString = pxMatch[0].toString();

        const spacing = spacingJSON[pxString.toLowerCase()];
        if (!spacing) {
          // ãƒãƒƒãƒãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯æœªå®šç¾©ã®ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¦æ³¨æ„ã™ã‚‹
          context.report({
            node,
            message: `undefined spacing rule: ${pxString} -> ??? [see utils/Spacing/index.ts(spacing.scss)]`,
          });
          return;
        }
        const definedSpacing = spacing.script;

        if (definedSpacing) {
          // ãƒãƒƒãƒã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯å€™è£œã‚’ææ¡ˆã™ã‚‹
          context.report({
            node,
            message: `${pxString} -> ${definedSpacing} [see utils/Spacing/index.ts(spacing.scss)]`,
            /**
             * eslint --fixå®Ÿè¡Œæ™‚ã«å¯¾è±¡ã®ç®‡æ‰€ã‚’è‡ªå‹•ã§ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®é–¢æ•°
             */
            fix(fixer) {
              const scope = node.parent;

              const sourceCode = context.getSourceCode().getText(scope);
              // æ–‡å­—åˆ—ç½®æ›
              const fixedProp = propString.replace(pxString, definedSpacing);
              const fixedCode = sourceCode.replace(propString, fixedProp);

              // å®Ÿéš›ã®ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸Šã«ã‚‚æ–‡å­—åˆ—ç½®æ›ã‚’åæ˜ ã™ã‚‹
              return fixer.replaceText(scope, fixedCode);
            },
          });
        }
      },
    };
  },
} as Rule.RuleModule;

module.exports = emotionSpacing;
export default emotionSpacing;

// eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-var-requires
const fs = require('fs');

const colorsSASS = fs.readFileSync(
  `${__dirname}/../src/styles/colors.scss`,
  'utf8'
);
const colorsMatch = colorsSASS.match(/color.*: #.*;/g);

const colors = colorsMatch.map((colorsText) => {
  return colorsText.replace(';', '').split(': ');
});

const json = colors.reduce((acc, [key, value]) => {
  acc[key] = value;
  acc[value] = key;
  return acc;
}, {});

fs.writeFileSync(`${__dirname}/colors.json`, JSON.stringify(json));
